fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - 🐳 someone, giving them Powerful defense from all their blubber. But you actually spray them with water first, undousing them.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Anyone who kills you or blocks you is modkilled and is banned because killing whales is illegal. This means if you are hanged, everyone who voted guilty is modkilled and banned.
- If you visit a role based on an animal that primarily swims or something that shares a name with an animal that swims you will eat them instead.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: React to at least ten messages in each day chat with 🐳 and survive until the end of the game.

desc:
Post 2765
*Y'all are gonna have a whale of a time.*
